verses.verse: And it shall be <S%H935><s%>, when thou art come in unto the land <S%H776><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, and possessest <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H3427><s%>, and dwellest therein,

that thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> of the first <S%H7225><s%> of all the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%>, which thou shalt bring <S%H935><s%> in from thy land <S%H776><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee <S%H7760><s%>; and thou shalt put it in a basket <S%H2935><s%>, and shalt go <S%H1980><s%> unto the place <S%H4725><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%>, to cause his name <S%H8034><s%> to dwell there <S%H7931><s%>.

And thou shalt come <S%H935><s%> unto the priest <S%H3548><s%> that shall be in those days <S%H3117><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H5046><s%>, I profess this day <S%H3117><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, that I am come <S%H935><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> unto our fathers <S%H1><s%> to give us <S%H5414><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> the basket <S%H2935><s%> out of thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, and set it down <S%H3240><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>.

And thou shalt answer <S%H6030><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, A Syrian <S%H761><s%> ready to perish <S%H6><s%> was my father <S%H1><s%>; and he went down <S%H3381><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and sojourned <S%H1481><s%> there <S%H4592><s%>, few in <S%H4962><s%> number <S%H1471><s%>; and he became there a nation, great <S%H1419><s%>, mighty <S%H6099><s%>, and populous <S%H7227><s%>.
And the Egyptians <S%H4713><s%> dealt <S%H7489><s%> ill with us <S%H6031><s%>, and afflicted us <S%H5414><s%>, and laid upon us hard <S%H7186><s%> bondage <S%H5656><s%>:

and we cried <S%H6817><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of our fathers <S%H1><s%>, and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> our voice <S%H6963><s%>, and saw <S%H7200><s%> our affliction <S%H6040><s%>, and our toil <S%H5999><s%>, and our oppression <S%H3906><s%>;

and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> brought us forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and with an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>, and with great <S%H1419><s%> terribleness <S%H4172><s%>, and with signs <S%H226><s%>, and with wonders <S%H4159><s%>;

and he hath brought <S%H935><s%> us into this place <S%H4725><s%>, and hath given <S%H5414><s%> us this land <S%H776><s%>, a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>.

And now <S%H935><s%>, behold, I have brought the first <S%H6529><s%> of the fruit of the ground <S%H127><s%>, which thou <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, hast given <S%H5414><s%> me <S%H3240><s%>. And thou shalt set it down before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, and worship <S%H7812><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>:

and thou shalt rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in all the good <S%H2896><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> unto thee <S%H1004><s%>, and unto thy house, thou <S%H3881><s%>, and the Levite, and the sojourner <S%H1616><s%> that is in the midst of thee <S%H7130><s%>.

When thou hast made an end <S%H3615><s%> of tithing <S%H6237><s%> all the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of thine increase <S%H8393><s%> in the third <S%H7992><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, which is the year <S%H8141><s%> of tithing <S%H4643><s%>, then thou shalt give <S%H5414><s%> it unto the Levite <S%H3881><s%>, to the sojourner <S%H1616><s%>, to the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and to the widow <S%H490><s%>, that they may eat <S%H398><s%> within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, and be filled <S%H7646><s%>.

And thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, I have put away <S%H1197><s%> the hallowed things <S%H6944><s%> out of my house <S%H1004><s%>, and also have given <S%H5414><s%> them unto the Levite <S%H3881><s%>, and unto the sojourner <S%H1616><s%>, to the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and to the widow <S%H490><s%>, according to all thy commandment <S%H4687><s%> which thou hast commanded <S%H6680><s%> me <S%H5674><s%>: I have not transgressed any of thy commandments <S%H4687><s%>, neither have I forgotten them <S%H7911><s%>:

I have not eaten <S%H398><s%> thereof in my mourning <S%H205><s%>, neither have I put away <S%H1197><s%> thereof <S%H2931><s%>, being unclean, nor given <S%H5414><s%> thereof for the dead <S%H4191><s%>: I have hearkened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>; I have done <S%H6213><s%> according to all that thou hast commanded me <S%H6680><s%>.

Look down <S%H8259><s%> from thy holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation <S%H4583><s%>, from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and bless <S%H1288><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and the ground <S%H127><s%> which thou hast given <S%H5414><s%> us <S%H7650><s%>, as thou swarest unto our fathers <S%H1><s%>, a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>.

This day <S%H3117><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> commandeth <S%H6680><s%> thee to do <S%H6213><s%> these statutes <S%H2706><s%> and ordinances <S%H4941><s%>: thou shalt therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them with all thy heart <S%H3824><s%>, and with all thy soul <S%H5315><s%>.

Thou hast avouched <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> to be thy God <S%H430><s%>, and that thou wouldest walk <S%H3212><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> his statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and his commandments <S%H4687><s%>, and his ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, and hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto his voice <S%H6963><s%>:

and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath avouched <S%H559><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%> to be a people <S%H5971><s%> for his own possession <S%H5459><s%>, as he hath promised <S%H1696><s%> thee <S%H8104><s%>, and that thou shouldest keep all his commandments <S%H4687><s%>;

and to make <S%H5414><s%> thee high <S%H5945><s%> above all nations <S%H1471><s%> that he hath made <S%H6213><s%>, in praise <S%H8416><s%>, and in name <S%H8034><s%>, and in honor <S%H8597><s%>; and that thou mayest be a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, as he hath spoken <S%H1696><s%>.
